website_summaries.verdict: A great pump for typical inflation needs. Good for anything that isn't large or heavy-duty like a car tire.
pros: Compact design keeps everything, including accessories and hoses, all in one place for easy storage
Simple wall outlet is enough for good compression

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Coleman pump. Our first lasted a very long time, was left out in the rain, filled with dirt, dropped in the pool, chewed by the dogs, just abused by all accounts, and it keep going and going. The reason we replaced it was the new dog finally chewed the hose beyond our capability to repair it. But the pump still works to this day. How could we not buy the same one? Would be nice if they had a replacement hose and tips on amazon though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V

customer_reviews.title: This is the best electric pump I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric pump I have ever used. It’s easy and inflats my huge swimming floats in minutes. I would recommend this for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this. Yes it blows up what you need, but the thing is so light that it’s constant flipping all over the place. It also has a strong smell to it. The valve does not stay on the hose at all either. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in. No batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This fits all air mattresses. I tossed out our battery powered ones because we are always home when we blow up mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but it works
customer_reviews.text: This thing works better than my 40 gal air compressor. Sure, I could crank the 40 gal up, but I'd end up blowing the side out of the pool floats. With the Coleman, it does the job great. Only complaints are that it is very loud and the tip will slip off if you are not holding it which gets kind of old for large floats.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love this pump
customer_reviews.text: Love this pump! Perfect for camping with our queen air mattress. Very powerful and quick filling. Also loved the deflating feature! Made packing up camp quick and easy. Also used to blow up our 15 foot ring on our Intex pool.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Fills fast and no overheating.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pump - fills fast and doesn’t overheat! I’ve had a few rechargeable Coleman pumps over the years that were great but I hated that I had to anticipate ahead of time when I’d need them so I could charge them up. Not for spontaneous use. And eventually they stopped charging. So last time I bought a plug-in Intex pump. It filled very slowly and overheated (got really hot in your hands)and shut off with limited use. This Coleman model hasn’t overheated once and we’ve used it often to fill our Quickset pool and repeatedly deflate and fill multiple oversized pool floats. Fills items very quickly!! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gardengirl11

customer_reviews.title: Works but not as powerful as I expected it to be but worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well this does blow things up it is very very slow since it is not very powerful. When I was inflating the ring for my Intex pool I was worried the motor might overheat since it took so long. It was also popping out of the pools valve as well so I had to sit there holding it. But as inexpensive as this is it is definitely far better than blowing things up with a hand pump or your mouth. .
customer_reviews.author: Ferretocious

customer_reviews.title: Plug in Only
customer_reviews.text: I stupidly thought there was a detachable cord for running on battery but it is plug in ONLY. My mistake but disappointing. The cord isn’t particularly long either, so you better be pretty close to an outlet. It’s also pretty loud so definitely don’t wait til bedtime to fill up that air mattress. Thst said, it works well. Comes with a car charger adapter. Aired up a pretty big swimming pool very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Milagro Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quick pump for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Coleman brand air pump because of my good experiences with that brand in the past. The pump is very light and powerful, inflating my pool-related supplies in short order. The power cord is slightly short, but I'm fine using a 8' extension cord. Attaching the hose to the pump body is sometimes a little challenging - the groove cutouts on the hose don't fit well with the nubs on the pump itself. The provided, attached hose adapter for inflating smaller inlets on items such as pool toys can easily slip off at times, too. Despite these small challenges, this pump is still a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetry Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, loud, and requires some juice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to inflate my airbed for camping. This thing is indeed fast when inflating. My queen bed took less than a minute to get to shape and another 30 seconds to finish. The two main drawbacks are the following: Noise: pretty loud, like a vacuum. So make sure you inflate your bed early if you're out camping so to not annoy your neighbors. Power draw: this things did not work with the car inverter I purchased. It would pulsate instead of inflate. Even using a jump pack it caused the jumppack to overheat. Overall, really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mae Anor Antolin

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: been sleeping on a air bed for months. have been using the battery powered pump but soon realized that with paying the cost of batteries that i would already paid for this one for years has a lot more power and was able to put the needed air back in the bed
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for the money. This thing pumps up floatable toys/ tubes extremely fast. This thing is VERY loud, and I would definitely say louder than a hairdryer or vacuum. That being said if it’s outside you are good.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: With two inflatable 2-person kayaks, one can spend a great deal of extra blowing them up (instead of being on the water). This little beauty does it in no time at all! The reverse mode (suck the air out) is so helpful, allowing you to get the kayaks back into their bags nice and neatly. And this unit is so small and compact it is easy to store in the same kayak bag. Well done, Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Grant

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in all vehicle types
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than our last one with the hose. For some reason this is the exact same brand and voltage but will not work in our SUV (110v). It only works in our pick up truck (115v). The previous one worked in both and it was the 120v. It works but the quality of Coleman is inconsistent. I don’t know why but they make the cords so short that the mattress would need to nearly be in the door to use. Can we get an extra couple feet?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just a pump all the time in the summer and this is getting plenty of use. It would be nice if it had more nosels but for the price who can complain. I have extra from other pumps. It certainly does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Blew out on my first pump. :(
customer_reviews.text: Had it in storage until it was time to use it (my fault for not testing asap) but yeah. It blew out on my first attempt. :( very sad. Wasn't expecting that so I missed the window for returning.
customer_reviews.author: W. Funes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this little pump. It is a perfect size & weight and came with the perfect tip for blowing up my pool and an attachment hose which is just handy! It works so well and so fast. Great Value pump. Great seller, too. Quick service!
customer_reviews.author: JaJa

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: Very good inflator. I’ve filled several air pillows for my Nader my furniture covers without any problem. I didn’t have the overheating issue that others have spoken about. I jus wish it had more adapters or at least the option to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: This one is a champ!
customer_reviews.text: This little pump works great! I previously purchased another brand that was the same size and it took forever to pump up what this Coleman brand pump will do in a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Angeleen

customer_reviews.title: quickpump gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: bought a new mattress but it didn't come with a pump. Ordered this one and it fit perfect and worked exactly as intended. Pros: cheap, plugs in, fast inflating Cons: short wire, slightly loud but not unbearable would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Limey

customer_reviews.title: LOUD and slow
customer_reviews.text: We have an old Inotek pump that works great, but the hose is starting to get holes. Despite this pump having great reviews, it doesn't work anywhere near as well as the old, cheap Inotek.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Good little pump to keep around
customer_reviews.text: I’ve lost/broke several pumps in the past (well, mostly my kids...). Tired of buying pumps that cost as much as the mattresses. This one works fine for a much more reasonable price. Great to keep around when you need it
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rall

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Inflation
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this pump. It's lightweight and easy to use. The product comes with two different sized inflation "heads" so it makes it super easy to blow up anything. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cowey

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the inflatable ring on the little above ground pool had a leak that we're having problems finding. The hand pump was getting old. This pump does what it says it should. I think the price point is a bit high for what you get, but overall I'm satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The hose and attachments do not stay attached. You have to hold everything in place for it to stay. I would return this if it hadn’t scratched it all over the ground and returns during COVID are much harder. I would have gladly paid more money for something that doesn’t cause so much extra work.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Works Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Our battery operated pump just wasn't powerful enough for me, so I bought this one, and I'm so glad I did. It inflates and deflates our Coleman air mattress very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Seandre

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and light weight. we packed it to bring it to the hotel and was nice to have a plug in vs battery operated as those always seemed to use to so many batteries.
customer_reviews.author: steph francis

customer_reviews.title: Love this pump
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few other pumps but my dad had this one and I loved it. When our latest broke I had a sad little boy that couldn’t use his new blow up pool. Amazon had my new pump here in a day! 💜
customer_reviews.author: LouVocals

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for being tiny. Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement/gift for my dad and he was stoked because it's the newer version of his old one which he bought from Coleman years ago for almost $50. It's a great air pump and great for blowing up large inflatable kiddie pools and small bounce houses. Very powerful for it being a tiny air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Super quick for rafts, floats, tubes... Glad to add it to our inventory. Use it a lot. (Why are you asking to rate thick ess?)
customer_reviews.author: CJasper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large, two-person float. It would be impossible to inflate without a device like this, and this one works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to air up our river floats, and for the price it’s excellent! Aired them up quickly and without issue. Also quite small so it’s easy to pack away.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: At least it works without cutting off
customer_reviews.text: works well on large pool floats but needs different nozzles- hard to fit into some floats- you have to really hold it there because it doesn't really fit. The hose curls up a lot which is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works if I use Medical tape to hold it to my air mattress
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful???
customer_reviews.text: Great pump. Works as expected. No issues for at home use. It lost 1 star because I use it with an AC adapter in my car. It blows the fuse. I thought I might as well get the better product for a better price since it was 67%. I guess I shouldn't have. Because it's too powerful for the cigarette lighter. Damn.
customer_reviews.author: owen dan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lung-saver!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Quickly inflated my two large rafts. The nozzle end is attached to the hose so you won’t lose it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meldrum

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for smaller items. I’m very impatient & it just didn’t inflate fast enough for me. Otherwise it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cali g

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to pump up our Intex River Run floats. It fit and worked perfectly. Happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a powerhouse hat blows up (and deflates) air mattresses in no time. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with 2017 Ford Escape
customer_reviews.text: My car has a 100v 150w power outlet and the air pump turns on and right back off. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pump it up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like this pump. Comes with multiple fittings for different types of inflatables. Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is quick to blow up large pool inflatables!!! Also works awesome to deflate those large pool inflatables for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY &  FAST SHIP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT!! Will inflate air mattress, towable waters ports tubes or similar items in a snap. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: Great Pump
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would take at least 5 minute to blow up kids portable pool. Did the job within 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: evzen

customer_reviews.title: Worked well !
customer_reviews.text: Used this to blow up our coleman air mattresses for camping, worked perfectly ! Great value !
customer_reviews.author: vicki smith

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this to blow up an air mattress yet, but I did try to use it to help blow up balloons for a party and it is not strong enough to blow up a balloon...
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly, surprisingly powerful for its size!. Blew up giant water slide in no time. Has multiple attachments for various nozzles. Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Zulkeira

customer_reviews.title: Practical!!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who has items that need to be blown up needs one of these!
customer_reviews.author: MCS1968

customer_reviews.title: I works
customer_reviews.text: I used it to fill my 15' above ground pool. It works real fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cabin Fever

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Fills toys and inflatables quickly; can't really ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Han

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Although very light and tilts over easily, it does its job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi

customer_reviews.title: Not for every inflatable item.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't an adapter for the exhaust port so it doesn't work for my needs for deflation. It does work well for inflation. However the inflation port and the deflation port or exhaust Port are of different diameters and that's the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nice little compact size. I have used it quite a bit and have no issues. It blows things up real quick.
customer_reviews.author: KTay123

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION SINCE SLICED BREAD!
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of taking turns blowing floaties up by lung breath! This does the job, lickety split! Probably would be great for air mattresses too...
customer_reviews.author: egrac

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast
customer_reviews.text: Thing works great. Inflates and deflates blow up lake toys quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Prayer warrior

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and inflated beds quickly. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: It'll blow up your floats!
customer_reviews.text: It has done what it is designed to do. Even held up to two GIANT FLOATS in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrel B.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well !
customer_reviews.text: Used it 25+ this summer to blow up inflatable pool - works fast and great - very impressed .
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Better then the hand pump, and faster, I have 2 air beds, so comes in handy when you need to get them ready fast!

customer_reviews.title: nice add on

customer_reviews.title: Everything was delivered as promised: price, delivery time, and product value.
customer_reviews.text: It was simple and easy to use in both inflating and deflating an air mattress. Another plus was how quickly it was delivered in addition to being competitively priced.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I’m gonna be using it to blow my bunny’s coat out. Works great, just super loud

customer_reviews.title: Dont like this product
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and it started smelling like a chemical and turned off.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The small valve doesn’t fit most inflatables. It works great for large floats!
customer_reviews.author: Wink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Air Pump
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do, inflate an air mattress! I like that it comes with an attachment to inflate other items as well. Also, it isn't super loud and inflated the air mattress quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Ball

customer_reviews.title: Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Recently received. Have yet to use but looks durable and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Teechee

customer_reviews.title: Works great definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great we use it for blowing up our pool toys and our tubes for the lake works great inflate stuff very fast
customer_reviews.author: Mildred F Massey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Hesitate, Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic, blew up two large air mattresses in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to fill kids' pool
customer_reviews.text: The small included attachment allowed this pump to work great to inflate a backyard swimming pool. A big relief after using a bike pump now that weather is hot! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little pump
customer_reviews.text: I blew up a queen size air mattress in minutes! Would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I own as my first disappeared. I like the fact that it is small, lightweight, and easy to use. It's a good little pump.
customer_reviews.author: Rora

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive hose attachment with order
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a hose with the order, but the machine works without it. That being said, it is extremely loud - but it gets the job done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia K

customer_reviews.title: Fast pump, quick fun
customer_reviews.text: Pumps up our tubes for going down River quickly so kids have more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Is noisy but very good for the price and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: It is well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The pump works very good for the money we use it for blowing up the pool floats

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This is great for blowing up our little pool for our 2 year old
customer_reviews.author: Emily Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, this little air pump was more powerful than expected. Much better performance than similar battery powered or rechargeable pumps. Very easy to use. Came with common attachments that would be needed.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pool toys
customer_reviews.text: As expected- easy to use to blow up our pool toys.

customer_reviews.text: Very great air pump! Aired up my son full air mattress up less than 5 minutes. Great price, will order this brand in future. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Very small and compact I blew up a large pool raft in less then 30 seconds, extremely impressed!

customer_reviews.title: Blow’ up real good
customer_reviews.text: Made blowing up my pool floaties so much easier. It creates a lot of air volume for such a small size pump (air compressor)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: We take this pump on all of our beach vacations as it pumps up our rafts in less than 1 minute. I used to inflate our rafts using my mouth which took about 10-15 minutes per raft. Now, 1 minute! We recommend this pump.

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning dust in tight areas
customer_reviews.text: Used for cleaning out dust in Air Vents. Perfect for that.

customer_reviews.title: Works like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, very easy to use and great value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my vacation to blow up floats. Works awesome to inflate and deflate. So glad I got it. Price is amazing considering I’ll be using this for years to come!!

customer_reviews.text: Powerful small electric airpump! We are very satisfied with its performance so far! Easily filled all of our pool rafts & toys!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dobres

product_meta.title: Coleman Quickpump 120V Pump
product_meta.description: Quickly inflate or deflate any airbed when you're at home with a Coleman quickpump 120V pump. Just plug it into your home outlet, connect it to the double lock Valve, and watch this powerful pump with a fast inflate and fast deflate design get your airbed ready in no time. The extension hose makes it even easier to connect this pump to your bed. Additional adaptors also allow you to use the pump on boston or Pinch valves, so you can fill other common inflatables. When the fun is done, the pump also deflates your airbed for quicker storage.
feature_bullets: Double lock/Boston valve adaptor to inflate airbeds and other inflatables
Pinch valve adaptor to fill most common inflatables
120Volt plug lets you power the pump from any home outlet
Flexible extension hose for more convenient use

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
